<title level="1" right="Rules">[Single Actions](/Rules.aspx?ID=61)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 17 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Single actions use this symbol: <actions string="Single Action" />. They’re the simplest, most common type of action. You can use three single actions on your turn in an encounter, in any order you see fit.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
